document_data.name: Violet Dindower
document_data.home: [[Waterdeep]], [[Sword Coast North]]{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1992|438|Violet Dindower}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Violet Dindower''' was a [[halfling]] cook and [[smuggler]] who worked aboard a [[spelljammer]].
document_data.Description: Violet had light skin and reddish-brown hair. She dressed in a low-cut brown tunic, and wore several pieces of jewelry.
document_data.Personality: She truly enjoyed her line of work. In addition to granting her a decent income, it provided her with enough risks to "keep life spicy."
document_data.Possessions:
Violet carried five packets of ''[[dust of disappearance]]'',{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1992|143|Violet Dindower's Dust of Disappearance}}

She also owned a ''[[short sword]] +1'', and a suit of ''[[leather armor]] +2''.
document_data.History:
Violet was dissatisfied with trying to eke out a living in [[Waterdeep]]. When a spelljammer stopped for repairs in the city, Violet jumped at the chance to sign on as a cook.

Her stealthy eliminations of unwanted guests endeared Violet to the ship's captain on many occasions.
